thread.title: 21 Things Every Major "Moana" Fan Can Relate To
thread.title_full: 21 Things Every Major "Moana" Fan Can Relate To

author: Julianna Garofalo
title: 21 Things Every Major "Moana" Fan Can Relate To
text:
Even though he literally only ever does ONE useful thing. ID: 10682073 13. Making this face when someone says they haven’t seen the movie yet: View this image › 
Disney ID: 10728725 14. Believing shark head Maui is the best Maui: View this image › 
Disney ID: 10728783 15. Refusing to put up with that criticism of setting nonsense: "moana is bad because most of the movie is on a boat" titanic has 11 oscars
— aristotle (@aristotiIes) ID: 10684835 16. Getting chills at this scene EVERY DAMN TIME: View this image › 
Disney ID: 10728518 17. Feeling salty about the film not winning any Academy Awards: View this image › 
Instagram: @moanamemes ID: 10728479 18. Understanding the true moral of the story: Moana is teaching us to repair our "broken" hearts so that we could become our natural selfs and live in harmony again.
— Omo Agba Metala (@omoagbametala) ID: 10734637 19. Being super jealous of home girl’s gorgeous hair: View this image › 
Disney Seriously, what conditioner she use?
ID: 10728953 20. Bonding with others who are equally as Moana -obsessed: View this image › 
Disney ID: 10728892 21. And, of course, struggling to believe it’ll be outdone by Disney’s next: https://guiltyhipster.tumblr.com/post/157321429992/youve-heard-of-moana-now-get-ready-for View this embed › 
ID: 10685341 *considers the coconut* View this image › 
Disney ID: 10728671 Did you know you can sign up for a BuzzFeed Community account and create your own BuzzFeed posts? Here’s a handy guide to help you start posting today ! ID: 10739585 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
